thread.title: "Золотое яблоко" новый аромат Gentleman Givenchy.
thread.title_full: "Золотое яблоко" новый аромат Gentleman Givenchy. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: "Золотое яблоко" новый аромат Gentleman Givenchy.
posts.text:
В 1975 году Givenchy представил миру Gentleman – уникальное видение мужественности, великолепный аромат, отличающийся от всех мужских парфюмов того времени. Givenchy Gentleman – это мощная композиция, подчеркивающая связь с миром моды, в основе которой необычное сочетание пачули и специй. Это – аромат, который добавляет "остроты" и дерзости в галантный образ мужчины, позволяя ему выделиться из толпы.
В 2017 году бренд Givenchy, черпая вдохновение в оригинальном аромате 1970-х, предлагает новое парфюмерное творение для современного джентльмена. Но что означает быть джентльменом 21-го века? В первую очередь, это значит быть элегантным и открытым. Мужественный и нежный в равной мере, джентльмен Givenchy – свободный и сильный духом вопреки всем существующим клише. Гедонист, который наслаждается жизнью и относится к окружающим с благородством и великодушием.
НАСТОЯЩАЯ МУЖЕСТВЕННОСТЬ
Требуется смелость, чтобы проявить свою чувственную сторону… И смелость, чтобы решиться продемонстрировать свою утонченность. Джентльмен Givenchy может позволить себе быть нежным.
Неожиданное сочетание нот, такое же смелое, как и джентльмен с его собственным, уникальным взглядом на элегантность. Благородный аккорд лаванды и ириса, создатели аромата, знаменитые парфюмеры, Натали Лорсон (Nathalie Lorson) и Оливье Кресп (Olivier Cresp) поместили в сердце композиции. Сложное соблазнительное пудровое звучание, объединено с нотой нежной, сладкой груши.
Аккорд кожи и пачули тонко намекая на оригинальную версию 1975 года, изящно усиливает этот новый древесный цветочный фужерный аромат.
Givenchy удалось создать композицию с множеством аспектов и яркой индивидуальностью, изысканную и очень смелую, для уверенного в себе мужчины, который полностью принимает себя таким, какой он есть. Современный джентльмен Givenchy демонстрирует утонченные манеры, но делает это без малейших усилий.

thread.title: Ceylanpınar’da yol yapım çalışmaları hızlandı
thread.title_full: Ceylanpınar’da yol yapım çalışmaları hızlandı

posts.title: Ceylanpınar’da yol yapım çalışmaları hızlandı
posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Ceylanpınar’da yol yapım çalışmaları hızlandı Ceylanpınar Belediyesi tarafından ilçe merkezinin dört bir yanında kilitli parke taşı çalışmaları aralıksız sürüyor.Kış öncesi daha çok alanı çamurdan kurtarmak amacıyla süratle cadde sokaklarda devam eden çalışmaları inceleyen... 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:08   @BursaHaberMedya 
Ceylanpınar Belediyesi tarafından ilçe merkezinin dört bir yanında kilitli parke taşı çalışmaları aralıksız sürüyor. 
Kış öncesi daha çok alanı çamurdan kurtarmak amacıyla süratle cadde sokaklarda devam eden çalışmaları inceleyen Belediye Başkanı Menderes Atilla, yaptığı açıklamada Ceylanpınar’ı tozdan ve çamurdan kurtarmak için yoğun bir şekilde üst yapı çalışmalarına ağırlık verdiklerini söyledi. Bahçelievler ve Cumhuriyet mahallelerinde çalışmaların aralıksız sürdüğünü belirten Başkan Atilla, "Halkımızın emrindeyiz. Halkımızı hizmetlerle buluşturacağız. Ceylanpınarımızı tozdan ve çamurdan kurtarıyoruz. Büyük bir çalışma yapıyoruz. Günde ortalama 2-3 km yol yapıyoruz ama yine de yetiştiremiyoruz. Hizmet gitmemiş çok bölgemiz. Bu bölgelerde önce kanalizasyon döşeniyor, daha sonra içme suyu şebekesi döşeniyor ve ardından da kilitli parke taşı çalışmamızı yapıyoruz. İnşallah 2019’a kadar yollarımızın büyük bir çoğunluğunu bitirmiş olacağız" dedi. 
Cumhuriyet Mahallesi sakinlerinden Ethem Gündüz de, çalışmalardan dolayı duyduğu memnuniyeti ifade ederek, "Bundan daha iyi, daha mükemmeli ve daha hızlı bir hizmet olamaz. Belediyemiz bir caddeyi bir günde tamamlıyor. Allah belediye çalışmalarını nazardan saklasın. Belediye başkanımıza çalışmalarından dolayı çok teşekkür ediyoruz" diye konuştu. Ahmet Bahuşa da Belediye Başkan Menderes Atilla’ya çalışmalar dolayısıyla teşekkür ederek, "Çocuklarımız okula giderken çok zorlanıyorlardı. Çünkü kışın her yer çamur yazı da tozdu. Perişan bir durumdaydık. Çalışmalardan çok memnunuz" ifadelerini kullandı. 1

thread.section_title: Welcome to Kesmalindo's Blog
thread.title: Osinbajo reveals ‘incredible things’ that happened under Goodluck Jonathan
thread.title_full: Osinbajo reveals ‘incredible things’ that happened under Goodluck Jonathan

posts.author: Biobaku Soliu (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Osinbajo reveals ‘incredible things’ that happened under Goodluck Jonathan
posts.text: Vice President, Yemi Osinbajo has uncovered what he described as “incredible things” former President Goodluck Jonathan did in office. Osinbajo said this while speaking at the legislative economic summit themed “Legislative Framework for Economic Recovery and Sustainable Development” in Abuja on Monday. He said under the administration of Jonathan, Nigeria witnessed barefaced stealing and waste of resources unprecedented anywhere in the world; the situation, he alleged, caused the recent economic recession. He said between 2013 and 2015 with oil prices averaging up to $110 per barrel, “sometimes going to as high as $150, the government of the day somehow contrived to increase national debt from N7.9 trillion to N12.1 trillion; while reducing external reserves from $45 billion to $28 billion as of May 2015.” According to Osinbajo, under Jonathan’s watch, there was also inflation of contracts and other procurements which, he noted, always made the cost of infrastructure necessary for development unaffordable. He added, “Of course, we all know that there was very little by the way of investment in infrastructure and capital projects. In fact in 2015, capital spend was less than 11%. So there was very little to show for where this money went. “I don’t want to keep repeating some of the incredible things that happened, a few weeks before the last elections; how large sums of money, a 100billion in cash ostensibly for security. Another $289million in cash was paid out in the same period. “No country can survive that kind of unbridled waste and corruption. We must never forget, that corruption is perhaps, the most outrageous cause of our economic decline. “Aside from barefaced stealing or waste of resources, the inflation of contracts and other procurements ensures that the cost of infrastructure necessary for development will always be unaffordable. share your thoughts in comment box

Laughter Spot : The one about a Pub called the “George and the Dragon” 
A homeless guy is travelling down a dark country lane, tired and hungry. He comes across a Pub called the "George and the Dragon." 
Although it's late and the Pub is closed, he gently knocks on the door. The innkeeper's wife sticks her head out of a window. "Could I have some food please?" he asks. The woman glances at his shabby clothes and obviously poor condition and sternly says, "No!" [more…] B60 continues global expansion following JV deal with Fanaticus Inc. 
B60, a leading mobile strategy consultancy and emerging technology development company, has forged a joint venture (JV) partnership with Dublin-based fan engagement agency Fanaticus Inc., to create B60 Europe. 
Fanaticus Inc., led by Founder and Director Trevor O’Rourke and CEO Karl Mulligan, will bring new expertise to B60 and bolster its digital transformation offering to sport and commercial organisations across Europe, further growing B60’s digital strategy services. With the two companies having extensively worked together for the past 18 months, this corporate association will further solidify their relationship. [more…] Which 20 year old has landed a plum job in the Cabinet Office? 
He’s better known for his recurring appearances on hugely popular reality show Gogglebox. 
But Josh Tapper is taking a protracted break from the BAFTA Award winning Channel 4 series, which focuses on groups of friends and family members and their frequently animated reactions to British television shows, while he takes a job in the Cabinet Office. 
The 20-year old – a regular on Gogglebox since 2013 – has been offered a Civil Service apprenticeship at the prestigious Whitehall address, where more than 2,000 staff work directly with Prime Minister Teresa May and her cabinet.

posts.title: Hiscox 9-month Gross Written Premiums Rise 12.4% - Quick Facts
posts.text:
Hiscox 9-month Gross Written Premiums Rise 12.4% - Quick Facts November 07, 2017, 02:34:  Hiscox Ltd (HSX.L), a specialist insurer, reported that its gross written premiums in the first nine months of the year to 30 September 2017 grew by 12.4 percent to 2.09 billion pounds from 1.86 billion pounds in the year-ago period. The increase was 4.9 percent in constant currency. 
The increase in gross written premiums reflects a strong performance across all segments, particularly from Hiscox USA where premiums grew 29 percent in constant currency. 
Bronek Masojada, Hiscox CEO, stated, "2017 is turning out to be an historic year for catastrophes and Hiscox's first priority is to help our customers get back on their feet. Our long-held strategy of balance and diversity was built for this environment, as our retail businesses provide stability when volatility impacts the big-ticket areas." 
This is based on an insured market loss of $25 billion for Harvey - excluding the government backed National Flood Insurance Program, $35 billion for Irma, and $30 billion for Maria. 
  This article appears in: Stocks , Insurance , Politics More from RTT News

thread.title: Teollisuusliiton valtuusto päättää tes-neuvottelutuloksesta
thread.title_full: Teollisuusliiton valtuusto päättää tes-neuvottelutuloksesta

posts.author: STT
posts.title: Teollisuusliiton valtuusto päättää tes-neuvottelutuloksesta
posts.text:
Tulosta Teollisuusliiton valtuusto kokoontuu tänään päättämään sen ja Teknologiateollisuuden välisestä työehtosopimusneuvottelutuloksen hyväksymisestä. 
Osapuolet sopivat viime viikolla uudesta työehtosopimuksesta, joka toisi kahden vuoden aikana keskimäärin 3,2 prosentin palkankorotukset. Ratkaisuun sisältyy kolmas optiovuosi, jonka palkkaratkaisusta sovittaisiin keväällä 2019. Neuvottelutulos koskee lähes 100  000:ta työntekijää. 
Teollisuusliiton puheenjohtaja Riku Aalto toivoo, että neuvottelutulos hyväksytään tämänpäiväisessä kokouksessa. 
Neuvottelukunnan esitys oli yksimielinen ja valtuustolle on annettu lausunto, jota hallituksen suuri enemmistö puoltaa, hän lisää. 
–  Meillä on perinteisesti käyty laajaa arviointikeskustelua neuvottelutuloksiin liittyvistä asioista, ja sitä odotan tälläkin kertaa, Aalto sanoo STT:lle. 
Kokouksen odotetaan päättyvän aikaisintaan kello neljältä iltapäivällä.

指导意见：
 你好，根据你说的情况，我认为，可以初步考虑为致病的心理因素所致。这主要是由于你到现在还没有帮助自己能有效地消除导致你产生焦虑症的心理因素，使你到现在还容易产生你所叙述的感觉或症状。因此，我建议你，当前你需要考虑的是帮助自己选择以心理咨询为主，药物治疗为辅的原则进行治疗，以便主要通过心理咨询，来帮助你能有效地消除致病的心理因素，增强你的抵抗焦虑的心理素质，从而让你能尽快地摆脱焦虑症给你带来的困扰。

Mr. Clive Johnson reports
THIRD QUARTER AND YEAR-TO-DATE 2017 RESULTS - CONFERENCE CALL / WEBCAST DETAILS
B2Gold Corp. will release its third quarter and year-to-date 2017 results before the North American markets open on Nov. 8, 2017.
B2Gold executives will host a conference call to discuss the results on Wednesday, November 8, 2017, at 10:00 am PST / 1:00 pm EST. You may access the call by dialing the operator at +1 647-788-4919 (local or international) or toll free at +1 877-291-4570 prior to the scheduled start time or you may listen to the call via webcast by clicking here: http://www.investorcalendar.com/event/21171. A playback version will be available for one week after the call at +1 416-621-4642 (local or international) or toll free at +1 800-585-8367 (passcode 1308311).
About B2Gold Corp.
Headquartered in Vancouver, Canada, B2Gold Corp. is one of the fastest-growing intermediate gold producers in the world. Founded in 2007, today, B2Gold has five operating gold mines and numerous exploration and development projects in various countries including Nicaragua, the Philippines, Namibia, Mali, Burkina Faso, Colombia and Finland.
Based on current assumptions and updates to B2Gold's current year guidance and long-term mine plans, the Company is projecting consolidated gold production in 2017 of between 530,000 and 570,000 ounces (including estimated pre-commercial production from the new Fekola Mine of between 50,000 and 55,000 ounces). In 2018, production is forecast to increase significantly to between 925,000 and 975,000 ounces with the inclusion of the anticipated first full year of commercial production at Fekola.

posts.author: 247PRESSRELEASE
posts.title: CYPHER LEARNING Launches Innovative Ad-hoc Reporting and Compliance Features for NEO LMS
posts.text:
CYPHER LEARNING Launches Innovative Ad-hoc Reporting and Compliance Features for NEO LMS 247PRESSRELEASE
CYPHER LEARNING, the company that specializes in providing learning platforms for organizations around the world, announced the launch of ad-hoc reporting and compliance features to NEO, its learning management system for schools and universities.
SAN FRANCISCO, CYPHER LEARNING , the company that specializes in providing learning platforms for organizations around the world, announced the launch of ad-hoc reporting and compliance features to NEO , its learning management system (LMS) for schools and universities.
With the release of these features, NEO is the only LMS that now offers compliance and advanced reporting capabilities for K 12 schools and Higher Education.
The compliance feature is useful for schools investing in continuing professional development (CPD) as it allows them to track their compliance. Schools are able to select the required courses or learning paths, set up the time period for which an educator is in compliance once they’ve completed the course, and whether they need to renew their compliance periodically. Users can also set up rules that are triggered when compliance is almost due, and when an educator goes out of compliance.
The new ad-hoc reporting feature allows administrators and educators to create custom reports using parameters defined by them. Users can select the data that they want to report on such as users, classes, paths, organizations, and more.They can also choose from a variety of fields, use filtering options, sort and group data by different parameters, and choose the chart output.
Graham Glass, CEO of CYPHER LEARNING explained why the release of these features was so important for the company: “We’re constantly focused on offering innovative features in order to provide schools with solutions to their administrative and classroom challenges. We believe these new features are differentiators for NEO and give us a clear advantage on the market.”
NEO is an LMS for schools and universities that is known for its intuitive user interface, extensive feature set, and strong return on investment. NEO provides a refreshingly new way to teach and learn that boosts student engagement and makes teaching easier.
NEO was already a powerful learning management system, providing a indispensable set of features for schools and universities, such as content authoring, competency-based learning, gamification, automation, learning paths, and integrations with the most popular third-party systems.
NEO recently won the award for Best Learning Management System in the 2017 Tech Edvocate Awards . The Tech Edvocate Awards honors the best that edtech has to offer by recognizing outstanding companies, people, and products.
About NEO and CYPHER LEARNING
NEO is a world-class, award-winning LMS for use by schools and universities. The platform is known for its easy-to-use and beautiful user interface, a comprehensive set of innovative features, and pricing that provides great value for money. NEO is a product of CYPHER LEARNING, a company that specializes in providing e-learning platforms for organizations around the world. CYPHER LEARNING products are used by over 20,000 organizations, supports 40+ languages, and have millions of users.

posts.title: Hisarcık’ta 3 Boyutlu Şekillendirme Kursu açıldı
posts.text:
TEKNOLOJİDE KADINLARIN ZAMANI Hisarcık’ta 3 Boyutlu Şekillendirme Kursu açıldı Kütahya’nın Hisarcık ilçesinde Halk Eğitim Merkezi Müdürlüğünce 3 boyutlu şekillendirme kursu açıldı.Şehitler Ortaokulunda Görsel Sanatlar Öğretmeni Raziye Uysal nezaretinde açılan 3 boyutlu şekillendirme kursuna katılan 20 kursiyere... 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 11:08   @BursaHaberMedya 
Kütahya’nın Hisarcık ilçesinde Halk Eğitim Merkezi Müdürlüğünce 3 boyutlu şekillendirme kursu açıldı. 
Şehitler Ortaokulunda Görsel Sanatlar Öğretmeni Raziye Uysal nezaretinde açılan 3 boyutlu şekillendirme kursuna katılan 20 kursiyere renk bilgileri, tasarı ilkeleri, desen panosu, 3 boyutlu resim yapma, rölyef hazırlama, bitkisel geometrik ve klasik rölyef konularında bilgiler veriliyor. 
Eğitmen Raziye Uysal, 3 boyutlu şekillendirme kursunun sabır isteyen bir sanat olduğunu söyleyerek,”Resimlere derinlik sağlayıp, perspektiflerine dikkat ederek yapılan çalışmalarda resimlere 3 boyutluluk kazandırılıyor” dedi. Toplam 280 saat süreli kurs sonunda ortaya çıkan eserlerin sergileneceğini belirtildi.(MA-EFE) 1

thread.title: CNMI gambling machine operators sue, claiming rights violation
thread.title_full: CNMI gambling machine operators sue, claiming rights violation

posts.title: CNMI gambling machine operators sue, claiming rights violation
posts.text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook CNMI gambling machine operators sue, claiming rights violation An owner of poker gambling machines on Saipan has sued, stating a new law that limits gambling to certain areas violates his Constitutional rights. Post to Facebook A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs CNMI gambling machine operators sue, claiming rights violation Steve Limtiaco, slimtiaco@guampdn.com Published 2:06 p.m. ChT Nov. 7, 2017 | Updated 2:06 p.m. ChT Nov. 7, 2017 Share CLOSE Move over slot machines. Casinos are now adding skill-based video games to traditional games of chance. It's part of an effort by casinos to attract more millennials. (May 2) AP The Garapan tourist district in Saipan. (Photo: Courtesy of Michael Sablan) CONNECT 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE An owner of poker gambling machines on Saipan, and the operator of those machines, have sued the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, stating a new zoning law, which limits gambling only to certain areas, violates their Constitutional right to due process of law. Their lawsuit states the CNMI government is depriving them of property – the poker machines they purchased, set up and paid fees to operate – without due process. The “Saipan Adult Machine Business Zoning Law of 2013” was enacted in late October 2013, and its zoning restrictions took effect late last month. “It is the purpose of this law to improve the quality of life of Commonwealth citizens and to provide for the socially and commercially acceptable location of adult gambling machine businesses,” the law states. It states adult gambling machine businesses have to be located in an Adult Business Park, a Tourist Resort, Garapan Core, Garapan East, or Beach Road Zoning Districts. Within those zones, they must be at least 200 feet from other adult gambling machine businesses and from any church, laundromat, school park or playground. READ MORE: Hearing on H-2B case likely in early 2018 According to the lawsuit filed by Sin Ho Nam and Dan Bi Choi in the District Court of the CNMI, in order to remain in business, the law would require them to spend money to relocate to new locations within the approved zones for gambling. The law also prohibits them from selling the machines to someone else, the lawsuit states, because it places a cap on new machine licenses. If they don’t move, they face government fines of $1,000 per day. “The Zoning Commission has declared that Saipan owners and operators to shut down or required pay a daily penalty fee of $l,000 unless the owners of these businesses abandoned their leasehold interests and their investments in equipment and infrastructure and relocated to designated areas on Saipan set aside for the operation of adult gambling machine businesses,” the lawsuit states. Nam, from Korea, is the director and principal shareholder of WinnersLife, Inc., and has been in the CNMI since 2008 under long-term investor status, the lawsuit states. His business has the licenses for 19 poker machines in the villages of Fina Sisu and Kagman. It pays the CNMI an annual licensing fee of $12,000 per machine, and the current licenses don’t expire until next year. Choi has a business to operate the poker machines owned and licensed by WinnersLife, the lawsuit states. The lawsuit notes the long history of gambling in the CNMI and the resulting economic benefit, and states the Legislature in 2013 decided to regulate the location of adult gaming machine businesses in Saipan and residential villages, in part so it could grant an exclusive and lucrative license for casino gambling. “Cutting off plaintiffs’ rights to operate duly licensed businesses, prior to the termination of these licenses, amounts to an interference with duly protected property interests,” the lawsuit states. And, because both men are in the CNMI on investor visas, their immigration status is in question if they lose their businesses, the lawsuit states. They asked the federal court to issue a declaratory judgment, stating the enforcement of the Saipan Zoning Law interferes with their legally protected property interests. They also asked the court to issue an injunction, prohibiting the zoning law from being forced against, them until the court hears evidence in the case. CONNECT 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://www.guampdn.com/story/money/2017/11/07/cnmi-gambling-machine-operators-sue-claiming-rights-violation/838720001/ TOP VIDEOS

thread.title_full: Busti: “El peronismo se reconstruye desde las bases”

posts.author: pablo
posts.title: Busti: “El peronismo se reconstruye desde las bases”
posts.text: DOCENTES 1 Busti: “El peronismo se reconstruye desde las bases” En la tarde de este lunes, el ex gobernador Jorge Pedro Busti estuvo en la localidad de Alcaraz, invitado por referentes justicialistas. En su visita, primeramente recorrió la Escuela N°1 “Tratado de Alcaraz”, donde compartió una charla con directivos y alumnos de la institución. En la ciudad del departamento La Paz, el peronismo le ganó en octubre al oficialismo de Cambiemos y hoy ya se encuentra en pleno proceso de construcción política para las próximas elecciones. Acompañaron a Busti: los concejales locales Alejandra Mayer y Willy Monzón?;? el referente del FEF, ?Rubén Fries; y los ex intendentes, Hugo Boyero y Humberto Alem. En el club Unión Alcaraz, el? ex mandatario respaldó? la decisión de Bordet tendiente a reducir el gasto superfluo del Estado ?entrerriano: “Siempre manifesté? que es necesario gobernar con prioridades y hacer más eficiente el funcionamiento de la administración con un manejo austero y transparente de los recursos”. En ese sentido, Busti consideró? como “una decisión política llena de sensatez” el anuncio del gobernador de reducir a cinco la cantidad de misterios en la provincia. ?Asimismo, sobre la situación del justicialismo, ?Busti destacó: “?El peronismo va a volver a nacer con una ?sincera autocrítica? puertas adentro, democracia interna y con una fuerte renovación dirigencial en contacto con las bases”. En consonancia, hizo alusión a los jóvenes que lo acompañan en el Frente Entrerriano Federal. ? También participaron de la reunión: el secretario del gremio municipal,? Orlando Martínez?; el presidente de la unidad básica local,? M?a?rcos Leone?; el presidente del Centro de Estudiantes, Osvaldo Urvine; y la presidenta de la agrupación “Jóvenes a Seguir”, Delfina Fries. ?De Bovril, estuvieron los dirigentes José Carlos Tomé y Daniel Barrientos, mientras que de Santa Elena asistió el ex senador provincial Juan Ramón Fleitas. Por último, Busti anunció que empezará a recorrer la provincia “como militante, rodeado de jóvenes y ?en contacto directo con las bases, para contribuir al resurgimiento de un peronismo participativo y que se acuerde de los de abajo”. A su vez anunció que próximamente estará en San Jaime de la Frontera?, otra localidad entrerriano donde el peronismo triunfó

posts.title: Alert issued for teens taken by noncustodial mother - NBC Montana
posts.text:
Posted: Nov 06, 2017 05:57 PM MST Updated: Nov 06, 2017 05:57 PM MST 
MISSOULA, Mont. - State officials issued an alert Monday for two missing teens taken by their noncustodial mother. 
Tianna Marie Pantalion, 35, reportedly took Susanna Marie Gibson, 15, and Kadance Spencer, 13, from foster care. The girls are believed to be in danger. 
They were last seen Friday in Billings. 
They could be in a black 2007 Pontiac G6 with Montana license plate 3-48923C and may be en route to California. 
Pantalion is 5-foot-4, 150 pounds, with brown hair and blue eyes. Officials report she may be under the influence of drugs. 
Gibson is 5-foot-6, 120 pounds, with brown hair and blue eyes. She has her lip and both ears pierced. She was last seen wearing a black tube top, black shorts, black leggings with holes and was carrying a black backpack. 
Spencer is 5-foot-3, 105 pounds, with browh hair and green eyes. She was last seen wearing a multi-colored shirt and jeans. 
Anyone with information is asked to contact Billings police at 406-657-8460 or call 911. © Copyright 2017 by KECI, KCFW, KTVM. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed. Latest Videos

thread.title: Συνάντηση του Κυρ. Μητσοτάκη με Λε Μερ στο Παρίσι
thread.title_full: Συνάντηση του Κυρ. Μητσοτάκη με Λε Μερ στο Παρίσι

posts.title: Συνάντηση του Κυρ. Μητσοτάκη με Λε Μερ στο Παρίσι
posts.text:
ΕΤΙΚΕΤΕΣ: Νέα Δημοκρατία 
Στο τετ α τετ που είχε με τον Εμανουέλ Μακρόν στην Αθήνα, ο Κυριάκος Μητσοτάκης είχε μιλήσει για την ανάγκη η Ελλάδα να μιλά ως ισότιμος εταίρος και ως συνδιαμορφωτής των εξελίξεων στην Ευρώπη. Το χθεσινό ξαφνικό ραντεβού του προέδρου της Ν.Δ. με τον Γάλλο υπουργό Οικονομικών Μπρινό Λε Μερ στο Παρίσι, μόνο τυχαίο δεν είναι. Η πολιτική του σημειολογία είναι προφανής, καθώς πραγματοποιήθηκε την ώρα που το γαϊτανάκι των ευρύτερων αλλαγών σε κορυφαίες ευρωπαϊκές θέσεις και δη σε αυτήν του προέδρου του Eurogroup, για το οποίο ο Λε Μερ παίζει δυνατά, έχει αρχίσει. 
Ο κ. Μητσοτάκης επιδιώκει να κρατήσει ανοικτούς τους διαύλους με τον Γάλλο πρόεδρο και το επιτελείο του, όπως, άλλωστε, είχε συμφωνηθεί και στο ραντεβού τους στην Αθήνα. Οχι μόνο επειδή η Γαλλία είναι μια σύμμαχος χώρα που πάντα στηρίζει την Ελλάδα αλλά και ο κ. Λε Μερ είναι ο επικρατέστερος διάδοχος του Γερούν Ντάισελμπλουμ και άρα σύντομα θα έχει ακόμη ουσιαστικότερο λόγο στις συζητήσεις για το ελληνικό πρόγραμμα. Το βλέμμα του κ. Μητσοτάκη είναι προσανατολισμένο στο μέλλον. Και, πάντως, ξεπερνά το ελληνικό πρόγραμμα, παρότι η 40λεπτη συζήτηση με τον Γάλλο ΥΠΟΙΚ στράφηκε στην τρίτη αξιολόγηση και στην επόμενη μέρα του Αυγούστου του 2018, τις επενδύσεις, αλλά και τις προτάσεις της Ν.Δ. για την οικονομία. Ο πρόεδρος της Ν.Δ. –γνωρίζεται με τον κ. Λε Μερ μέσω του ΕΛΚ πριν εκείνος γίνει υπουργός του Μακρόν– πιστεύει ότι η χώρα δεν πρέπει να εγκλωβίζεται σε μια αέναη συζήτηση για το μνημόνιο, δεδομένων μάλιστα των σκωτσέζικων ντους των δηλώσεων Eυρωπαίων αξιωματούχων περί «καθαρής εξόδου». Θεωρεί ότι η χώρα πρέπει να έχει ρόλο και λόγο στη συζήτηση που βρίσκεται σε εξέλιξη για το μέλλον της Ευρώπης και υπό αυτό το πρίσμα, έχει λόγους να βλέπει θετικά την ατζέντα Μακρόν. 
Την ίδια ώρα, κυβέρνηση και Νέα Δημοκρατία αντάλλαξαν... σημειώσεις με αφορμή τις αποκαλύψεις των Paradise Papers. Σε δήλωσή του, ο πρωθυπουργός αναφέρει ότι «μία από τις βασικές αιτίες που μας οδήγησαν στην κρίση, ήταν η αδιαφανής δράση μιας καλομαθημένης οικονομικής ελίτ, η διαπλοκή της με το πολιτικό σύστημα και η σταθερή της αντίσταση να επωμιστεί τα βάρη που της αναλογούσαν, τα οποία προκλητικά φόρτωνε, με τη συνδρομή των πολιτικών της φίλων, στους πιο αδύναμους». Η Ν.Δ. σήκωσε το γάντι, καλώντας την κυβέρνηση να πράξει αυτή τη φορά «την αυτονόητη υποχρέωσή της, να ελέγξει γρήγορα και αποτελεσματικά τους πάντες και τα πάντα. Να ξεκαθαρίσει, δηλαδή, ποιοι Eλληνες με απολύτως νόμιμο τρόπο ασκούσαν επιχειρηματική ή επαγγελματική δραστηριότητα στο εξωτερικό και ποιοι έχουν προβεί σε φοροδιαφυγή ή άλλη παράνομη δραστηριότητα, οδηγώντας τους τελευταίους το ταχύτερον δυνατόν ενώπιον της Δικαιοσύνης». Εμμέσως πλην σαφώς, η Πειραιώς κάλεσε την κυβέρνηση να σταματήσει να παίζει με τις επικοινωνιακές εντυπώσεις. Κι αυτό, διότι στο Μοσχάτο είναι πεπεισμένοι ότι η κυβέρνηση θα καταφεύγει συνεχώς σε επικοινωνιακούς αντιπερισπασμούς και σε προσπάθεια να προκαλέσει ρήγματα στο εσωτερικό της Ν.Δ. – και με την υπόθεση του κοινωνικού μερίσματος. Σύμφωνα με πληροφορίες, η Ν.Δ. θα καταθέσει μέσα στις επόμενες ημέρες τη δική της πρόταση, πετώντας το γάντι στην κυβέρνηση να προσχωρήσει σε αυτήν. Έντυπη

thread.title_full: Nada a Perder goleia por 4 a 0 o La Resenha e avança para as quartas de final da Copa da Macaca 2017

posts.author: Futebol da Quebrada (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Nada a Perder goleia por 4 a 0 o La Resenha e avança para as quartas de final da Copa da Macaca 2017
posts.text:
Abrindo as oitavas de final da 5ª Copa da Macaca 2017, a equipe do Nada a Perder do Jardim Rosana goleou por 4 a 0 o La Resenha, a bola rolou no CDC Maria Caetano. 


A equipe do Nada a Perder melhor colocada no grupo F não decepcionou e goleou. Fez um bom jogo, abriu o placar logo de cara com um golaço de falta do lateral esquerdo Baiano. Bateu com perfeição sem chances para o goleiro Neguinho do La Resenha. 
A melhor chance do La Resenha foi com o atacante Robinho que quase empatou a partida. A zaga do Nada a Perder vacilou e Robinho limpou o goleiro Toinho e na hora de fazer o gol chutou fraco e a zaga se recuperou, tirou em cima da linha jogando para escanteio. 
E quem não faz toma! foi o que aconteceu. O NP foi para o ataque e o meio campista Jaime acertou um lindo chute de fora da área. A bola fez a curva saindo do alcance do goleiro Neguinho, que nada pode fazer, golaço, Nada a Perder 2 a 0 La Resenha. 


No segundo tempo a equipe do Nada a Perder com vantagem no placar começou devagar, tocando a bola de lado e nada de ir para o ataque. Por outro lado o jovem time do  La Resenha perdendo o jogo foi para o ataque, só que não conseguia achar espaços para os chutes a gols. 
E quando o Nada a Perder resolveu atacae, fez o terceiro gol. O meio campista Isaac recebeu passe na direita e bateu forte, a meia altura no canto do goleiro Neguinho que acabou tomando o gol, Nada a Perder 3 x 0 La Resenha. 

No fim do jogo ainda deu tempo de fechar a goleada, contra-ataque rápido Igor deixou Magela sozinho . Ele teve a calma de jogar a bola debaixo das pernas do goleiro Neguinho, fitar  Robinho e com o gol aberto só empurrou para o fundo da rede, fazendo uma pintura de gol, Nada a Perder 4 a 0 La Resenha. 
Com a goleada a equipe do Nada a Perder se classificou para as quartas de final da competição, já o La Resenha se despede da 5ª Copa da Macaca 2017. 
Nas quartas de final a equipe do Nada A Perder tem um jogo difícil pela frente vai enfrentar o atual campeão da competição o Filhos da Terra. 






Ficha técnica: 
Local: CDC Maria Caetano – Zona Sul – SP
Data: 04/11/2017 - 
Arbitro: Eraldo Holanda
Assistente 1: Denis Gonçalves
Assistente 2: Bruno Mascarenhas
4º Arbitro: Marcos
Gols: Baiano, Jaime, Isaac e Magela (Nada a Perder) 
Nada A Perder: 1- Toinho; 19- Maycon, 13- Baiano, 5- Marcelinho, 3- Rodrigo, 7- Lemos, 21- Michael, 15- Jaime, 10- Isaac, 9- Gama e 11- Elton – Banco de reservas: 6- Dede, 8- Igor, 17- Minato, 22- Jhow Jhow, 28- Magela – Técnicos: Jailton e Michel 
La Resenha: 1- Neguinho; 2- Renato, 3- Amauri, 4- Daniel, 5- Lucas, 6- Italo, 13- Paulinho, 20- Iguinho, 10- Thiago, 7- Robinho e 9- Lucas – Banco de reservas: 12- Douglas; 14- Arthur, 18- Biel, 19- Natan, 21- Junior, 16- Rodney, 11- Juninho, 15- Flank – Técnico: Sapão 

Reportagem Eduardo Lima

thread.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) Storage Engineer Intermediate
thread.title_full: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) Storage Engineer Intermediate

posts.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) Storage Engineer Intermediate
posts.text:
University of Michigan Storage Engineer Intermediate in Ann Arbor , Michigan 
How to Apply 
A cover letter and resume are required. The cover letter must be PAGE 1 of your resume and should: 
Specifically outline the reasons for your interest in the position 
Outline your particular skills and experience that directly relate to this position and 
Include your current or ending salary 
Starting salary may vary depending on qualifications and experience of the selected candidate. 
Job Summary 
Advanced Research Computing - Technology Services (ARC-TS) is the University of Michigan research IT provider specializing in High Performance Computing (HPC), BigData (Hadoop/Spark/etc), high speed networking, storage and other technologies to accelerate the research mission of the institution. The ARC-TS organization has an exciting opportunity to hire a Research Storage Intermediate to be part of a team working on portfolio of storage systems within ARC-TS. The primary responsibilities for this position include: 
Assisting the development, deployment, maintenance and support of new storage services for University of Michigan researchers for archiving and active storage. 
Reponsibility for assisting in the maintenance and support of our existing storage services currently over 7PB including IBM Spectrum Scale/GPFS and Lustre parallel filesystems on High Performance Computing (HPC) clusters and NAS filers. 
Provide expertise towards projects leading to the development of HPC in the Cloud. 
For more information about ARC-TS visit our website: http://arc-ts.umich.edu 
Responsibilities* 
Research Storage Support: Storage System Updates and Patches, System Configuration, System Health and Performance Monitoring and the Provisioning and Destruction of Media. 
User Support: Support users access to ARC-TS storage systems, support the high performance transport of data over national and local networks, troubleshoot user requests and support researchers use of storage systems from external providers - Cloud, Central IT. 
System Capacity Planning: Monitor usage of storage resources and make recommendations to maintain services, collaborate with other ARC-TS staff for data center utilization, maintain inventory of storage resources under ARC-TS management, work within ARC-TS to improve the research computing environment on campus. 
Development of Self: Stay abreast of application technology trends in storage infrastructure and environments (computers, accelerators, system management methods, etc.) by way of on-the-job training, attending technical courses or conferences, reading, researching and testing. 
Organizational Competencies 
While not limited to the following, in this role the successful candidate will be expected to demonstrate the following organizational competencies: 
Advancing the Mission: Demonstrates knowledge of the primary mission of the University and Health Systems, demonstrates awareness of the diversity of constituency groups and their roles and purposes and issues. 
Creative Problem Solving / Strategic Thinking : Demonstrates the ability to provide necessary attention to solve different level problems, often multitasking to solve moderate level problems, defines problems, analyzes causes, identifies possible solutions, selects the best solution and develops action plans. Generates new ideas and goes beyond the status quo. Demonstrates the ability to use creative thinking to improve processes and solve complex problems. 
Development of Self and Others: Demonstrates the initiative in participating in growth opportunities for continuous development and improvement, demonstrates ability to apply new skills/knowledge to the job and serves as a training resource to less experienced staff. 
Quality Service: Demonstrates the ability to establish and maintain effective relationships with internal and external customers in a manner that consistently meets the organization’s expectations for exemplary customer service, demonstrates the ability to see issues from the customer’s perspective assesses urgency of requests and responds accordingly, demonstrates focus on fulfilling expectations by seeking insight into customer needs and developing solutions that provide value for the customer. 
Required Qualifications* 
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, business computing or a related field and/or equivalent combination of education, certification or experience. 
A minimum of two (2) years of experience in a related role requiring customer service, confidentiality, timeliness, organization, prioritization, troubleshooting and working independently to successfully design services and workflows. 
A minimum of one (1) year of experience in implementing storage and backup solutions. 
Demonstrated ability to lead project teams and provide timely project status reports. 
Ability to leverage appropriate technical tools to perform day-to-day administration tasks, root-cause analysis and service restoration (such as backup, restore, failover, log interpretation and performance monitoring) for at least two of the following: SAN, NAS and enterprise backup solutions. 
Strong Linux background. 
Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively in technical concepts via email, letters and in person to teams and customers. 
Ability to manage priorities in face of multiple requests and projects. 
Desired Qualifications* 
Experience with deployment of storage systems using NFS v4 with Kerberos. 
Experience with Spectrum Scale/GPFS, Lustre and EMC OneFS. 
Experience with Object Storage or HDFS. 
Experience with iSCSI, SMB/CIFS, or SRP. 
Understanding of protected data (HIPAA, CUI, etc.). 
Experience in a high-performance computing cluster environment. 
Experience with LDAP and Active Directory in a storage service. 
Experience providing IT support in an academic or research environment . 
Experience with Cloud Storage API’s. 
Experience with Globus GridFTP, Aspera, or FDT. 
Experience with hierarchical storage management (HSM) systems such as SAM-QFS, Black Perl, HPSS, Spectrum Archive etc, with object or tape backends. 
Additional Information 
Some development may be applicable to open source projects. In addition, there may be opportunities to speak at relevant conferences regarding work done on these endeavors. 
Diversity, Equity and Inclusion : The University of Michigan Information and Technology Services seeks to recruit and retain a diverse workforce as a reflection of our commitment to serve the diverse people of Michigan, to maintain the excellence of the University and to offer our students richly varied disciplines, perspectives and ways of knowing and learning. 
Comprehensive Benefits: The University of Michigan is committed to offering a high-quality benefits package to support faculty, staff and their families. Learn more at https://hr.umich.edu/benefits-wellness 
GO BLUE! 
The University of Michigan is ranked No. 2 public university in the United States and 27th overall in a survey announced 09/27/2017 by The Wall Street Journal and Times Higher Education. 
The University of Michigan maintained its ranking as the No. 4 public university in U.S. News & World Report's 2018 annual list of the nation's best undergraduate colleges and universities. 
The University of Michigan was featured as one of the "Great Colleges to Work For" in the 2017 Chronicle of Higher Education. 
The University of Michigan is ranked No. 3 by Money Magazine’s “Best Colleges for Your Money 2017/2018" which evaluated 711 higher education institutions on 27 factors within three broad categories: educational quality, affordability and alumni success. 
Application Deadline 
Job openings are posted for a minimum of seven calendar days. This job may be removed from posting boards and filled anytime after the minimum posting period has ended. 
U-M EEO/AA Statement 
The University of Michigan is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. 
Job Detail

thread.title_full: Duda - Los SUV son más seguros en lluvia. | Página 4 | BMW FAQ Club

posts.author: Leon
posts.text:
Reihesechs dijo: ↑ Igualdad de condiciones es igual tecnología. No es lo mismo un tren delantero de un MB W221 que el de Renault 12.
En el resto del debate te estás yendo más allá del terreno del post que se refiere a la afirmación en la prensa de que un SUV es más seguro en mojado. Induscutiblemente falso en términos generales.
Que un Macan sea más seguro en mojado (y en seco) que un SEAT 124 también es indiscutible. Pero es un caso puntual llevado al extremo. Hacer clic para expandir... Yo lo que te digo es que en mojado, un tracción 4X4 es más seguro que un 4X2, y un tracción delantera es mas seguro que un propulsión trasera.
Y por lo general, hasta hace no mucho, los SUV eran casi todos 4X4. Ahora el tema ha cambiado
Es decir un X1 por ejemplo XDRIVE en mojado es mas seguro que un SDRIVE, y un serie 3 tres cuartos de los mismo.

How Do You Compare to the Competition? Get facts about other applicants with a CareerBuilder Account Sign Up Job Description 
General Motors Spring Hill Manufacturing has a need for qualified Mechanical Journeypersons (e.g. machine repair, mechatronic technician). Working under minimal supervision with a high level of independent judgment and problem solving, the Mechanical Journeyperson is responsible for maintaining production and quality by ensuring operation of industrial machinery and mechanical equipment. The Mechanical Journeyperson needs to be flexible enough to take on multiple job assignments in a shift and be skilled at priority setting. 
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES 
Follow established safety procedures according to OSHA standards and company procedures 
Troubleshoot and repair complex electromechanical systems working with other skilled and non-skilled Team Members 
Fabricate, drill, weld, cut, and bolt to install, maintain, dismantle, repair, or replace mechanical components (e. g. bearings, seals, details, carriers, etc.) on industrial machinery 
Maintain, dismantle, repair, and replace mechanical and hydraulic components on industrial machinery such as shafting, motors, generators, air compressors, cranes, conveyor belts, engines, pumps, and valves 
Maintain, and repair piping systems 
Use various hand or power tools for measuring, cutting, threading, grooving, bending, soldering, assembling, joining, and installing pipes, valves, and fittings 
Read and interpret blueprints for the mechanical operation and assembly of conveyor systems, material handling systems, robots, and other automation 
Operate mobile equipment (e. g. forklifts, vertical lifts, cranes) 
Determine loading requirements to rig equipment and material for lifting 
Plan sequences of operations for fabricating tools or assemblies using blueprints, sketches, or models 
Determine quality of finished products, ensuring defect-free parts, by verifying dimensions, alignment, and clearances for conformance to specifications using measuring instruments such as calipers, gauge blocks, micrometers, and dial indicators 
Promote teamwork and show a willingness to work with other departments; 
Participate in continuous improvement activities; 
Adhere to the principles of the GMS-Global Manufacturing System. “The Global Manufacturing System is a single, common manufacturing system that engages all employees to use best processes, practices, and technologies to eliminate waste throughout the enterprise.” Job Requirements 
Interested individuals must meet the following minimum qualifications: 
U.S. Department of Labor Completion of Apprenticeship Certificate in a Mechanical trade (millwright, pipefitter, toolmaker, machine repair) or six (6) years of documented experience in a Mechanical trade (notarized documentation required) 
Able to work any shift and work some overtime including daily, weekend, and holidays 
Preferred 
Experience with industrial robotics, automation, and conveyance systems 
Experience with planned maintenance systems and predictive technologies 
Applicants must be: 
At least 18 years of age; 
Eligible to work in the United States; 
Willing to submit to a drug test and background check. 
General Motors offers a competitive compensation and benefit package. 
Location: Spring Hill, TN 
Relocation and travel expenses will be the responsibility of the applicant 
EEO Clause 
The policy of General Motors is to extend opportunities to qualified applicants and employees on an equal basis regardless of an individual's age, race, color, sex, religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression or protected veteran status. 
http://generalmotors-skilledtrades.appone.com/

posts.author: betlibero (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Λενγκλέ ο νέος στόχος της Μπαρτσελόνα για το κέντρο της άμυνας
posts.text:
Η ενίσχυση με έναν κεντρικό αμυντικό που θα συνδυάζει ποιότητα και προοπτική είναι προτεραιότητα για την Μπαρτσελόνα, με τον στόπερ της Σεβίλλης. Κλεμέντ Λενγκλέ. να είναι το νέο όνομα που εξετάζεται. 

Έχοντας αποφασίσει να πως η συμφωνημένη οψιόν αγοράς του Μίνα θα ενεργοποιηθεί το καλοκαίρι, ο Βαλβέρδε κοιτάζει τις διαθέσιμες επιλογές για το κέντρο της άμυνας, εφόσον αποχωρήσει άμεσα ένας εκ των Μαστσεράνο, Βερμάελεν, με τον Κλεμέντ Λενγκλέ να βρίσκεται στα «ραντάρ» των «μπλαουγκράνα», όπως αναφέρει η ιστοσελίδα Sport. 

Ο 22χρονος Γάλλος της Σεβίλλης πραγματοποιεί εξαιρετική σεζόν και αποτελεί τον ποδοσφαιριστή που ο Εδουάρδο Μπερίσο έχει χρησιμοποιήσει τις περισσότερες φορές μέχρι στιγμής, με τις εμφανίσεις του να αποδεικνύουν πως είναι θέμα... χρόνο να αποχωρήσει από την ομάδα της Ανδαλουσίας. To συμβόλαιο του Λενγκλέ με την Σεβίλλη εκπνέει το 2021 με συμφωνημένη ρήτρα αγοράς του στα 30 εκατομμύρια ευρώ, αν και το διαφαινόμενο ενδιαφέρον για τον άσο της «Μπάρτσα» Αλέις Βιντάλ ενδεχομένως να μειώσει το συνολικό κόστος εφόσον οι δύο ομάδες έρθουν σε συζητήσεις.Πηγη:sdna.gr

posts.author: JD848
posts.text: If you can get a hose clamp taped inside so you don't scratch it around your rotary switch or tape the rotary switch and tighten the clamp till it gets solid ,then you won't tear it apart while trying to unscrew the cap making it more solid so you can put out a bit more power on the top screw cap.Find some thing like a silver dollar that fits snug in your slot so you don't strip it and snap the end of the vise grip as tight as you can on the twist nut on the hose clamp,don't go crazy on the pressure and use another set of vise grips to snap onto what ever fits tight in your slot.It has to be even level pressure as you turn so you don't bust your rotary switch, I don't want you to reck your scope so this is just a thought that may work. When you tighten the clamp make sure it makes even contact 360 degrees around the rotary switch so not to bend anything.The clamp sides maybe to wide touching the cap so this may not work.Don't start cutting things until you hear from aimpoint or send it to them for the work .GOOD LUCK

thread.title: Turkish PM hails US visa move as 'positive step'
thread.title_full: Turkish PM hails US visa move as 'positive step'

posts.title: Turkish PM hails US visa move as 'positive step'
posts.text: Turkish PM hails US visa move as 'positive step' Yildirim prepares to head to Washington where he will meet US Vice President. Middle East Online Turkish PM Yildirim ANKARA - Turkish Prime Minister Binali Yildirim on Tuesday hailed the resumption of limited visa services by the US as a "positive step" as he prepared to head to Washington. The US and Turkish embassies in Ankara and Washington announced on Monday they would start processing visa applications for each other's citizens after an almost month-long suspension. "The resumption of visa services, even if limited, is a positive step," Yildirim said during a press conference at Ankara airport before he was due to fly. He will meet with Vice President Mike Pence during the visit expected to last until Friday. The diplomatic row began after the US decided to stop handing out visas in Turkey from October 8, which was followed almost immediately by a tit-for-tat move by Ankara to stop issuing Turkish visas for Americans. The US move was in response to the arrest of a US consulate staffer accused of having links to the group of US-based preacher Fethullah Gulen. The employee remains in custody. Ankara blames Gulen for last year's failed coup against President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, charges the preacher strongly denies. The US embassy in Ankara said it resumed visa services after the Turkish government gave "assurances" that no other US mission employee in Turkey was under investigation and that Turkey would inform the US in advance if further arrests were made. But the Turkish embassy in Washington said late Monday it could not provide "any assurances regarding files that are subject of ongoing legal processes". Yildirim said it would "not fit with the principles of the rule of law" to either give or ask for such reassurances. Several American citizens are in custody in Turkey including pastor Andrew Brunson, who ran a church in the western city of Izmir. He has been held since October 2016 on charges of being a member of Gulen's group. Turkey continues to call for Gulen's extradition, a bone of contention between the NATO allies and a subject Yildirim again brought up. "Everything has been done for the extradition," Yildirim said, referring to files sent to the US. He added that Turkey expected the US judiciary to start legal proceedings against Gulen.

posts.author: Reihesechs
posts.text:
Leon dijo: ↑ Yo lo que te digo es que en mojado, un tracción 4X4 es más seguro que un 4X2, y un tracción delantera es mas seguro que un propulsión trasera.
Y por lo general, hasta hace no mucho, los SUV eran casi todos 4X4. Ahora el tema ha cambiado
Es decir un X1 por ejemplo XDRIVE en mojado es mas seguro que un SDRIVE, y un serie 3 tres cuartos de los mismo. Hacer clic para expandir... Con los actuales chasis (sin siquiera entrar en los DSC) a mi esa ventaja me parece irrelevante de cara a la seguridad.
Mi problema en mojado no está al acelerar, que es donde la tracción total tiene clara ventaja, sino al frenar o apoyar en curva.
En mojado un 4x4 sale más rápido de una curva, pero la entra igual, es decir, si llego a velocidad correcta con el 4x4 puedo salir más deprisa, pero si entro pasado me salgo igual con tracción delantera que trasera que 4x4 y encima el 4x4 lleva algo más de lastre.

thread.section_title: KTM Archives - Page 5 of 5 - Paul Tan's Automotive News
thread.title: VIDEO: DC Shoes Pipe Dream - a real amphibious bike
thread.title_full: VIDEO: DC Shoes Pipe Dream - a real amphibious bike

posts.author: Graham Chin
posts.title: VIDEO: DC Shoes Pipe Dream - a real amphibious bike
posts.text:
In a video that would make you go “that’s sick dude,” American footwear brand DC Shoes collaborated with Australian stuntman Robbie ‘Maddo’ Maddison to come up with a video that we predict would be “making waves” in just a matter of days. For full mind-blowing effect, watch it in 4K.
In the video, the self-professed Maddo rides a modified, amphibious KTM scrambler from land to sea and even onto big waves with ease.
The bike took two years to make, said Maddison. It wears paddle tyres, which are designed to take on terrain like sand dunes and mud to give it the physics required to propel it on water. Attached to the bike seems to be a set of skis that lets ol’Maddo here take on the famous waves of Teahupoo and Papara in Tahiti.
If you’re unfamiliar with who Robbi Maddison is, you might have seen him as James Bond. Well, sort of. Maddison was the stunt double for Daniel Craig in bike scenes of Skyfall . He has also done other notable stunts like the one in 2009, where he backflipped across London’s tower bridge. In 2010, he jumped across the Corinth Canal in Greece on a bike. This is a well-versed daredevil, that’s for sure.
Stunts like these and DC Shoes are not that uncommon, seeing as the co-founder of the footwear brand is professional rally driver, Ken Block, who is notoriously famous for his Gymkhana videos featuring the Subaru WRX STI , Ford Fiesta ST and more recently, the 1965 Ford Mustang .
An amphibious bike? Ain’t no pipe dream no more, it seems.

thread.section_title: ESPN FC News
thread.title: Michael Emenalo's resignation tough for Chelsea prior to transfer window
thread.title_full: Michael Emenalo's resignation tough for Chelsea prior to transfer window

posts.author: Liam Twomey, Chelsea correspondent
posts.title: Michael Emenalo's resignation tough for Chelsea prior to transfer window
posts.text:
1 day ago Michael Emenalo's resignation tough for Chelsea prior to transfer window Gab Marcotti explains Michael Emenalo's resignation as Chelsea technical director and Antonio Conte's role in him leaving. The FC crew answer your tweets on Chelsea's win over United and if Arsene Wenger should drop a distracted Alexis Sanchez. 
LONDON -- Less than 24 hours after a convincing victory over Manchester United at Stamford Bridge appeared to have steadied the ship, Michael Emenalo's surprise decision to resign as technical director served as a reminder that Chelsea never enjoy calm waters for long. 
The message from all sides was that, after 10 years, Emenalo wants a break, some family time and a fresh challenge -- Monaco has been cited as a potential destination. But coming amid a steady stream of reports pointing to significant tensions between Antonio Conte and club director Marina Granovskaia, the timing of Emenalo's departure raises questions. 
It could be tempting to view Monday's news as a victory for Conte. The Italian has made no secret of his frustration at having to navigate this season with a dangerously thin squad following the summer's troubled recruitment drive and, with one fewer voice in future conversations about Chelsea's transfer strategy, his own words might stand a better chance of swaying Roman Abramovich. 
The theory is compelling, but the reality is that Emenalo was the closest thing to an ally Conte had within the Chelsea hierarchy. Their offices separated by the width of a corridor in the first-team building at Cobham, the two men spoke daily, often watched training together and enjoyed a professional relationship, though not without its disagreements. It's hard to say what Michael Emenalo's resignation means for Chelsea manager Antonio Conte. 
Emenalo served a valuable purpose in that sense, as a calm line of communication and a mediating presence between the head coach and the board. Granovskaia works out of Stamford Bridge and Abramovich rarely visits Cobham because when he does -- most recently following last month's 1-0 win over Bournemouth -- it tends to prompt a flurry of speculation. 
Rather than strengthen Conte's hand, Emenalo's decision to step down actually has the potential to exacerbate any existing divisions between Chelsea's wildly popular head coach and Granovskaia, who will assume many of his responsibilities while the club reviews their management structure. 
Chelsea chairman Bruce Buck revealed that Abramovich and the board had accepted Emenalo's resignation "with regret," and there is plenty of reason to believe the feeling goes beyond the standard platitudes expected in such statements. 
As well as being a trusted and amiable figure, Emenalo also assumed without complaint the unofficial and unfortunate role of public lightning rod for a club hierarchy that, while overseeing spectacular success on the pitch, has done plenty to mystify and frustrate its fan base over the years. 
Fondness for Emenalo is in short supply among Chelsea supporters. Many disliked him from the moment he arrived at the invitation of Jose Mourinho's perceived usurper Avram Grant in 2007, scornful of his qualifications and dismayed at the collateral damage inflicted by his rapid rise. 
His elevation to assistant first-team coach in November 2010 came at the expense of club legend Ray Wilkins, and his influence was formalised in July 2011 with the grand but vague title of technical director weeks after Carlo Ancelotti had been coldly fired. 
Unsure of his precise responsibilities, many fans felt comfortable blaming Emenalo for any of the setbacks that followed on or off the pitch. He did himself no favours with the infamous "palpable discord" TV interview of December 2015, referring to the sacked Mourinho only as "the individual" while supporters mourned the second departure of their hero. 
There will be no such grief over Emenalo but, internally, his departure creates a number of problems for Chelsea. A potentially vital January transfer window edges closer, and while the Nigerian's job centred more around the identification of targets than the doing of deals, losing him now is less than ideal for preparation. Starlets such as Andreas Christensen, left, were developed in Chelsea's youth academy under Michael Emenalo. 
Conte will expect reinforcements if Chelsea remain in Premier League and Champions League contention, and Emenalo will not be around to absorb the backlash if the reigning champions of England find themselves scrambling for compromise targets in the final days of a second successive window. 
Ahead of January lies the task of either directly replacing Emenalo with a new technical director or revamping Chelsea's decision-making structure. Neither option will be straightforward given the unique set-up at Cobham, coupled with the relentless demands of the club's controversial mass loan system. 
It is there, and in a Chelsea academy that has emerged as a dominant power in England and Europe under revered director Neil Bath, that Emenalo believes his true Chelsea legacy lies. 
He strode onto the Stamford Bridge pitch on Sunday to hug academy graduate Andreas Christensen after the Dane had provided what he described as "a wonderful parting gift" with his near-flawless performance against United. In the coming days he will likely take similar pride in Tammy Abraham and Ruben Loftus-Cheek making their first senior appearances for England. 
Emenalo now has the luxury of revelling in his achievements. Chelsea, however, must find a way to keep moving forward without him in order to meet the expectations of their demanding head coach, as well as a fan base whose criticism can no longer be so easily deflected. 
Liam is ESPN FC's Chelsea correspondent. Follow him on Twitter: @Liam_Twomey.
